title: Intouch App
description: InTouchApp is a mobile-first collaboration platform built on top of phone contacts. It solves the main problems of today’s chat app groups: noise, mix-up of discussions, new member not having access to old data, lack of phone number privacy, and lack of shared space for contacts & documents. By using InTouchApp, individuals and groups - both large and small - become more productive via structured communication and information sharing.
